text: Marathon Motors Engineering, Plc. is a prominent joint venture between the South Korean automotive giant Hyundai Motor Company and Ethiopian long- distance runner Haile Gebrselassie. Located in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, the company serves as the official general importer of Hyundai vehicles in Ethiopia. It is also involved in local vehicle assembly ==History== Founded in 2009, Marathon Motors Engineering was established as a result of a partnership between Hyundai Motor Company and Haile Gebrselassie, a former Ethiopian long- distance runner. The company made its debut at a press conference during the presentation of the Haile Resort in Awasa. Marathon Motors started assembling vehicles locally in Ethiopia, with a plant located in Nifas Silk-Lafto, Addis Ababa. This assembly plant, inaugurated in February 2019, in July 2020, the company began assembling electric vehicles, including the Hyundai Ioniq. ==Models== Marathon Motors mainly produces locally Hyundai cars like the Hyundai Ioniq Other cars include: Hyundai Accent Hyundai Grand Creta Hyundai Kona EV Hyundai Ioniq 6 And the Hyundai Santa Fehttps://marathonmotorengineering.com/mme4/ ==References== Category:Automobile companies Category:Companies of Africa Category:Addis Ababa
title: Marathon Motors Engineering
